text.p: Coords.js is free for both commercial and non-commercial use and redistribution, provided that PD'Programming's copyright and disclaimer are retained intact. You are free to modify coords.js for your own use and to redistribute coords.js with your modifications, provided that the modifications are clearly documented.

This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of merchantability or fitness for a particular purpose. Please use it AT YOUR OWN RISK.
